amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the remaining funding for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan program and to apply the $6 million in savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program to $0 and increase funds in the Spending Reduction account to $6,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 252 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 252 (Roll no. 330).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
